dict.acceptation: 制造，创造；创造物，产物；（尤指<圣经>所述由上帝）创造天地，宇宙；（爵位等的）封授；

sent.orig: New creation which a re-creation. New creation patterned after first creation.
sent.trans: 新创造，同时是再创造。新的创造是照第一次创造的模样。

sent.orig: There always two creations. The physical creation follows the mental creation.
sent.trans: 创造总是经过两次完成的。在思想创造之后有实际创造。

sent.orig: Creation after creation has been pulled apart in this dance of non-physical immortality.
sent.trans: 在这种非物质永生的舞蹈之中，已有一个接一个的造物被撕开。

sent.orig: Construction starts new-style city, need big creation, also need small creation at the same time.
sent.trans: 建设创新型城市，需要大创造，同时也需要小创造。

sent.orig: The fourth part is theevaluation about physics creation consciousness and creation ability.
sent.trans: 第四部分为对物理创造意识和创造能力的评价。
